title: Jalapeno Tuna Melt Recipe
directions: Melt butter in heavy bottomed pan or skillet over medium heat. Place bread slices in pan and toast one side for about 2-3 minutes. Turn over and toast other side. Turn off heat under pan or skillet.
Combine all ingredients for tuna salad and spoon evenly onto toasted bread.
Top with grated cheese and place into oven until cheese melts, about 5 minutes.
